name: garden
about: You are standing in a sunny, Japanese garden

name: tree
about: A lovely, Japanese plum blossom tree

name: beach
about: You are on a beautiful, white beach

name: manual
about: It's a book on AI programming in Python, written by a bot

read: You start reading the Python manual.
You see a vision of a great battle involving 100 foot robots.
actions.use: I know this is stupid, but you actually have to type "read manual" to read it.

name: cave
about: You are in The Cave of Darkness. It's very dark in here! You hear a sound.

actions.listen: You hear a series of musical beeps, as if being played by an old IBM computer.
